Hypernym Detection
Approaches
13
Approaches for Hypernym detection from text:
2) Unsupervised Distributional Approaches
Most approaches based on DIH(Distributional 
Inclusion Hypothesis) 
Measures:
WeedsPrec (Weeds et al. 2004)
invCL (Lenci and Benotto 2012)
SLQS (Santus et al. 2014, Shwartz et al. 2017)
